<Text: The Hills Valley Weekly (formerly the Hills & Valley Messenger) is a weekly suburban newspaper in Adelaide, part of the Messenger Newspapers group.>

Text: Hills Valley Weekly:  The "Hills & Valley's" area is bounded by the Belair National Park in the north-east, and the suburbs of Darlington to the west and Happy Valley to the south.
